name: Can I Win as a Lv. 1 Slime? -underdog rising
name_original: Can I Win as a Lv. 1 Slime? -underdog rising
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50.

Controls

Arrow Keys/Controller Dpad - Move/Select

Space/Controller Bottom Face Button - Action

Story

With the revival of the Demon King, the Hero has once again embarked on a quest to stop this force of evil. He is a prodigy from a proud bloodline of warriors that have done battle as long as time could tell. It seems the Demon King's army has no chance of winning.

You are a lowly slime with attack power close to 0. However, with some divine guidance, maybe you can give the Hero what for?

Do your best, little slime!
